/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. Cars of various colors are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective and makes the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene.
